title: Terence McKenna True Hallucinations 720p
description:
True Hallucinations: Being an Account of the Author's Extraordinary Adventures in the Devil's Paradise
This mesmerizing, surreal account of the bizarre adventures of Terence McKenna, his brother Dennis, and a small band of their friends, is a wild ride of exotic experience and scientific inquiry. Exploring the Amazon Basin in search of mythical shamanic hallucinogens, they encounter a host of unusual characters -- including a mushroom, a flying saucer, and translinguistic matter -- and discover the missing link in the development of human consciousness and language.

Video Length: 2:49:49
Video Resolution: 1280x720
Audio: 192 kbps
